name: Flappy Bird Spin-off
description:
"A!" chill, relaxing Flappy Bird Spin-off made with the Godot engine (I love Godot). It's for personal, educational purposes only. Thanks for playing the game :>

The outside resources I used. Big thanks to all of them.
